title: fromFetch
contents:
mode_edit code
API / rxjs/fetch

fromFetchlink

使用 Fetch API 發出 HTTP 請求。

Uses the Fetch API to make an HTTP request.

警告 fetch API 的部分內容仍處於試驗階段。此實現需要 AbortController 才能正常工作和使用取消功能。

WARNING Parts of the fetch API are still experimental. AbortController is required for this implementation to work and use cancellation appropriately.

將自動設定一個內部 AbortController 以便在訂閱拆解時拆解內部 fetch。

Will automatically set up an internal AbortController in order to teardown the internal fetch when the subscription tears down.

如果一個 signal 是透過 init 引數提供的，它的行為就像它通常對 fetch 所做的那樣。如果提供的 signal 中止了，那麼在這種情況下通常會拒絕 fetch 的錯誤，並將其作為此 observable 的錯誤發出。

If a signal is provided via the init argument, it will behave like it usually does with fetch. If the provided signal aborts, the error that fetch normally rejects with in that scenario will be emitted as an error from the observable.

例子link

Exampleslink

基本用法

Basic use

import { fromFetch } from 'rxjs/fetch'; import { switchMap, of, catchError } from 'rxjs'; const data$ = fromFetch('https://api.github.com/users?per_page=5').pipe( switchMap(response => { if (response.ok) { // OK return data return response.json(); } else { // Server is returning a status requiring the client to try something else. return of({ error: true, message: `Error ${ response.status }` }); } }), catchError(err => { // Network or other error, handle appropriately console.error(err); return of({ error: true, message: err.message }) }) ); data$.subscribe({ next: result => console.log(result), complete: () => console.log('done') });

與分塊傳輸編碼一起使用link

Use with Chunked Transfer Encodinglink

對於使用分塊傳輸編碼的 HTTP 回應，fetch 回傳的 Promise 將在收到回應物件的標頭後立即解析。

With HTTP responses that use chunked transfer encoding, the promise returned by fetch will resolve as soon as the response's headers are received.

這意味著 fromFetch observable 將在接收到 body 之前發出一個 Response - 然後完成。當呼叫 Response 上的方法之一（如 text() 或 json() 時，回傳的 Promise 將在收到整個 body 之前不會解析。退訂任何使用 Promise 作為可觀察輸入的 Observable 不會中止請求。

That means the fromFetch observable will emit a Response - and will then complete - before the body is received. When one of the methods on the Response - like text() or json() - is called, the returned promise will not resolve until the entire body has been received. Unsubscribing from any observable that uses the promise as an observable input will not abort the request.

為了便於中止檢索使用分塊傳輸編碼的回應物件，可以透過 init 引數指定 selector ：

To facilitate aborting the retrieval of responses that use chunked transfer encoding, a selector can be specified via the init parameter:

import { of } from 'rxjs'; import { fromFetch } from 'rxjs/fetch'; const data$ = fromFetch('https://api.github.com/users?per_page=5', { selector: response => response.json() }); data$.subscribe({ next: result => console.log(result), complete: () => console.log('done') });

fromFetch<T>(input: string | Request, initWithSelector: RequestInit & { selector?: (response: Response) => ObservableInput<T>; } = {}): Observable<Response | T>

引數

input

你要獲取的資源。可以是 url 或請求物件。

The resource you would like to fetch. Can be a url or a request object.
initWithSelector

可選。預設值為 {}。

獲取的設定物件。有關更多詳細訊息，請參閱 MDN

A configuration object for the fetch. See MDN for more details

回傳值

一個 Observable，當被訂閱時，它使用原生 fetch 函式執行 HTTP 請求。Subscription 繫結到 AbortController 以進行獲取。

Observable<Response | T>: An Observable, that when subscribed to, performs an HTTP request using the native fetch function. The Subscription is tied to an AbortController for the fetch.
